title: book request
description: this is the request which is sent when the customer paid a reservation.

paid_at.description: the utc moment when the payment was done

token.description: token which should be registered for this action

type.description: token type. additional token types may be added in future.

identifier.description: token identifier, the meaning will depend on token type. for token type 'code', the identifier in the pin and will be client-generated.

secret.description: an additional token secret if necessary. in case of token type 'code', this is the code and will be backend-generated.

request_uid.description: this uid is the client side identifier for the whole transaction

uid.description: unique transaction identifier provided at reservation
